           <dt>pram&#x0101; </dt>
           <dd><em>pra-&#x221a;m&#x0101;</em> &#x0100;. <em>-mim&#x012b;te</em> (Ved. inf. <em>pra-m&#x00e9;</em> </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; Pass. <em>-m&#x012b;yate</em>), to measure, mete out, estimate AV. &#x015a;rS. MBh </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; to form, create, make ready, arrange RV. MBh </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; to form a correct notion of (acc.), understand, know MaitrUp. Hariv. Hit.: Caus. <em>-m&#x0101;payati</em>, to cause correct knowledge, afford proof or authority MW. 1</dd>

           <dt>&#x22d9; pramaya </dt>
           <dd><em>pra-&#x1e0d;maya</em> m. (for 2. See under <em>pra-&#x221a;m&#x012b;</em>) measuring, measure L</dd>

           <dt>&#x226b; pram&#x0101; </dt>
           <dd><em>pra-m&#x0101;&#x0341;</em> f. basis, foundation AV </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; measure, scale RV </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; right measure, true knowledge, correct notion Prab. Kap. Tarkas. IW. 59 &amp;c </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; a kind of metre RPr&#x0101;t </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; <em>-tva</em> n. accuracy of perception Bh&#x0101;sh&#x0101;p </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; <em>-tva-cihna</em> n. N. of wk</dd>

           <dt>&#x226b; pram&#x0101;&#x1e47;a </dt>
           <dd><em>pram&#x0101;&#x1e47;a</em> n. (ifc. f. <em>&#x0101;</em>) measure, scale, standard </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; measure of any kind (as size, extent, circumference, length, distance, weight, multitude, quantity, duration) K&#x0101;ty&#x015a;r. Ka&#x1e6d;hUp. Mn. &amp;c. (instr. 'on an average' Jyot.) </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; prosodical length (of a vowel) P&#x0101;&#x1e47;. 1-1, 50 Sch </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; measure in music MBh. (N&#x012b;lak.) </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; accordance of the movements in dancing with music and song Sa&#x1e43;g&#x012b;t </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; measure of physical strength &#x015a;ak. (cf. comp. below) </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; the first term in a rule of three sum Col </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; the measure of a square i.e. a side of it, &#x015a;ulbas </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; principal, capital (opp. to interest) Col </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; right measure, standard, authority G&#x1e5b;&#x015a;rS. Mn. MBh. &amp;c. (<em>pram&#x0101;&#x1e47;am bhavat&#x012b;</em>, 'your ladyship is the authority or must judge' Nal </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; in this sense also m. and f. sg. and pl., e.g. <em>ved&#x0101;&#x1e25; pram&#x0101;&#x1e47;&#x0101;&#x1e25;</em>, 'the Vedas are authorities' MBh </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; <em>str&#x012b; pram&#x0101;&#x1e47;&#x012b; ye&#x1e63;&#x0101;m</em>, 'they whose authority is a woman P&#x0101;&#x1e47;. Sch.) </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; a means of acquiring Pram&#x0101; or certain knowledge (6 in the Ved&#x00e2;nta, viz. <em>pratyak&#x1e63;a</em>, perception by the senses </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; <em>anum&#x0101;na</em>, inference </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; <em>upam&#x0101;na</em>, analogy or comparison </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; <em>&#x015b;abda</em> or <em>&#x0101;pta-vacana</em>, verbal authority, revelation </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; <em>an-upalabdhi</em> or <em>abh&#x0101;va-pratyak&#x1e63;a</em>, non-perception or negative proof </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; <em>arth&#x00e2;patti</em>, inference from circumstances </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; the Ny&#x0101;ya admits only 4, excluding the last two </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; the S&#x0101;&#x1e43;khya only 3, viz. <em>pratyak&#x1e63;a</em>, <em>anum&#x0101;na</em> and <em>&#x015b;abda</em> </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; other schools increase the number to 9 by adding <em>sambhava</em>, equivalence </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; <em>aitihya</em>, tradition or fallible testimony </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; and <em>ce&#x1e63;&#x1e6d;&#x0101;</em>, gesture IW. 60 &amp;c. &amp;c.) </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; any proof or testimony or evidence Y&#x0101;j&#x00f1;. MBh. K&#x0101;v. &amp;c </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; a correct notion, right perception (= <em>pram&#x0101;</em>) Tarkas </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; oneness, unity L </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; = <em>nitya</em> L </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; m. (cf. n.) N. of a large fig-tree on the bank of the Ganges MBh </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; (<em>&#x012b;</em>), f. (cf. n.) N. of a metre Col</dd>

           <dt>pravara 1</dt>
           <dd><em>pra-vara</em> mf(<em>&#x0101;</em>)n. (fr. <em>pra</em> + <em>vara</em> or fr. <em>pra</em> &#x221a;2. <em>v&#x1e5b;</em> </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; for 2. and 3. See p. 693) most excellent, chief, principal, best Mn. MBh. &amp;c </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; eldest (son) MBh </dd>

           <dd>&#x2022; greater (opp. to <em>sama</em>, 'equal', and <em>ny&#x016b;na</em>, 'smaller') Var </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; (ifc.) eminent, distinguished by Hariv </dd>

           <dd>&#x2022; of a D&#x0101;nava ib </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; (<em>&#x0101;</em>), f. N. of a river (which falls into the God&#x0101;var&#x012b; and is celebrated for the sweetness of its water) MBh. VP </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; n. aloe wood Bhpr </dd>

           <dt>pra&#x015b;na 2</dt>
           <dd><em>pra&#x015b;n&#x00e1;</em> m. (&#x221a;<em>prach</em>) a question, demand, interrogation, query, inquiry after (comp </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; cf. <em>ku&#x015b;ala-p&#x25cb;</em>) &#x015a;Br. &amp;c. &amp;c </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; judicial inquiry or examination (cf. <em>s&#x00e2;k&#x1e63;i-p</em>) </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; astrological inquiry into the future (cf. <em>divya-</em>, <em>deva-</em>, <em>daiva-p&#x25cb;</em>) </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; a subject of inquiry, point at issue, controversy, problem &#x015a;Br. &amp;c. &amp;c. (<em>pra&#x015b;nam</em> <em>pra-&#x221a;br&#x016b;</em>', to decide a controverted point' </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; <em>nam</em> &#x221a;<em>i</em>, with acc. or <em>&#x25cb;nam</em> <em>&#x0101;</em> &#x221a;<em>gam</em>, with loc. of pers., 'to lay a question before any one for decision' </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; <em>pra&#x015b;nas tava pitari</em>, the point at issue is before thy father') </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; a task or lesson (in Vedic recitation) RPr&#x0101;t </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; a short section or paragraph (in books) Col. &amp;c</dd>

           <dd><em>pr&#x00e2;y&#x00e1;</em> m. (fr. <em>pra</em> + <em>aya</em> </dd>

           <dd>&#x2022; anything prominent, chief part, largest portion, plenty, majority, general rule (often ifc., with f. <em>&#x0101;</em> = chiefly consisting of or destined for or furnished with, rich or abounding in, frequently practising or applying or using </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; near, like, resembling </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; mostly, well-nigh, almost, as it were </dd>

           <dd><em>pr&#x012b;</em> cl. 9. P. &#x0100;. (Dh&#x0101;tup. xxxi, 2) <em>pr&#x012b;&#x1e47;&#x0101;&#x0341;ti</em>, <em>pr&#x012b;&#x1e47;&#x012b;t&#x00e9;</em> </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; cl. 4. &#x0100;. (xxvi, 35) <em>pr&#x012b;yate</em> (rather Pass </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; ep. and m. c. also <em>&#x25cb;ti</em> and <em>priyate</em>, <em>&#x25cb;ti</em> </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; pf. <em>pipriy&#x00e9;</em>, p. <em>&#x25cb;y&#x0101;&#x1e47;&#x00e1;</em> Subj. <em>pipr&#x00e1;yat</em> </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; Impv. <em>pipr&#x00e1;yasva</em> or <em>&#x25cb;pr&#x012b;h&#x00ed;</em> RV </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; aor. <em>aprai&#x1e63;&#x012b;t</em> Br., Subj. <em>pr&#x00e9;&#x1e63;at</em> RV. <font color="#FF0000" font size=-2><a name="p710-1"></a>[Page 710, Column 1]</font> </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; <em>apre&#x1e63;&#x1e6d;a</em> Gr </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; fut. <em>pre&#x1e63;yati</em>, <em>&#x25cb;te</em>, <em>pret&#x0101;</em> ib.), P. to please, gladden, delight gratify, cheer, comfort, soothe, propitiate RV. &amp;c. &amp;c </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; (mostly &#x0100;. <em>pr&#x012b;yate</em>) to be pleased or satisfied with, delight in, enjoy (gen., instr., loc. or abl.) ib </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; (&#x0100; </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; ep. and m. c. also P. and <em>pri&#x25cb;</em>) to like, love, be kind to (acc.) MBh. R.: Caus. <em>pr&#x012b;&#x1e47;ayati</em> (<em>pr&#x0101;payati</em> Siddh., <em>pr&#x0101;yayati</em> Vop.), to please, delight gratify, propitiate &#x0100;&#x015b;vG&#x1e5b;. Y&#x0101;j&#x00f1;. MBh. &amp;c </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; to refresh, comfort Car.: Desid. <em>p&#x00ed;pr&#x012b;&#x1e63;ati</em>, to wish to please or propitiate RV.: Intens. <em>pepr&#x012b;yate</em>, <em>pepray&#x012b;ti</em>, <em>pepreti</em> Gr. [Cf. Goth. <em>frij&#x00f4;n</em>, <em>frij&#x00f4;nds</em> ; Germ. <em>friunt</em>, <em>freund</em> ; Angl. Sax. <em>fre&#x00f3;nd</em> </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; Eng. friend ; Slav. <em>prijati</em> ; Lith. <em>pre10telius</em> &amp;c.]</dd>

           <dt>&#x226b; priya </dt>
           <dd><em>priy&#x00e1;</em> mf(<em>&#x0101;</em>)n. beloved, dear to (gen., loc., dat. or comp.), liked, favourite, wanted, own RV. &amp;c. &amp;c. (with abl. 'dearer than' R. Kath&#x0101;s. Pa&#x00f1;cat </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; <em>priya&#x1e43;-&#x221a;k&#x1e5b;</em> &#x0100;. <em>kurute</em>, either 'to gain the affection of, win as a friend' RV </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; or 'to feel affection for, love more and more' MBh.) </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; dear, expensive, high in price (cf. <em>priya-dh&#x0101;nyaka</em>, <em>priy&#x00e2;nna-tva</em>) </dd>
           <dd>&#x2022; fond of attached or devoted to (loc.) RV.            <dd>&#x2022; aor. <em>apiplavat</em> Bha&#x1e6d;&#x1e6d;., <em>apupl&#x25cb;</em> Gr.), to cause to float or swim, bathe, wash, inundate, submerge K&#x0101;ty&#x015a;r. MBh. &amp;c. <font color="#FF0000" font size=-2><a name="p715-2"></a>[Page 715, Column 2]</font> </dd>
